control.name: comboChartType
control.description: Sets the type of a chart.

control.name: checkShowPointLabels
control.description: Sets whether to show labels for a series.

control.name: ceShowRowGrandTotals
control.description: Sets whether row grand totals are passed to a chart control.

control.name: ceShowColumnGrandTotals
control.description: Sets whether column grand totals are passed to a chart control.

control.name: ceSelectionOnly
control.description: Sets whether a chart control must display selected cells or the entire PivotGrid control data.

control.name: seUpdateDelay
control.description: Specifies the delay between changing the cell focus or selection, and updating the bound Chart control.

control.name: ceChartDataVertical
control.description: Sets whether series on a chart control are created for PivotGrid columns or rows.
